name: Let me fix that for you, Netflix
description:
This style shows more content on less space. Just continue scrolling to get rows after rows of suggestions.

Removes annoying content, like promo, red annotations, and shades over paused video.

Tested on Mac Firefox.
additional_info: 2020-07-02 Added color to the My List button so it can be more noticeable. 2020-04-06 Due to popular demand, I brought back Continue Watching. 2020-01-25 First release. Simple CSS, easily edited.
